name: FirstSupport.ai
headline: AI Assistant for Customer Support
description: FirstSupport is an AI-powered assistant for customer support. We give AI superpowers to support agents so they can reply quicker, understand multiple languages, get information quickly from knowledge base, summarize ticket in one click, get weekly customer support report, and many more. Available on Zendesk.

founders.name: Terry Djony, Founder
founders.description:
I'm Terry.
> grew up in a small city (Lampung) in Indonesia 
> at age 13, taught myself software engineering by reading books and building CMS
> got into top tech university in Indonesia
> built my first company, a chatbot development agency, during third year of college
> chose to drop out of uni & focus on tech startup full-time since 2021

generated_description:
**FirstSupport.ai: Simplifying Customer Support with AI**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from the vibrant city of Bandung, Indonesia, FirstSupport.ai is an AI-powered assistant designed specifically for customer support teams. The company, which initially began as FirstSupport, is a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch W21, positioning it within a prestigious accelerator that has nurtured numerous successful startups.

The mission of FirstSupport.ai is clear: to empower customer support agents. By integrating advanced AI capabilities, they enable agents to work more efficiently—be it through faster response times, multilingual communication, or quick access to relevant knowledge bases. With features like one-click ticket summarization and weekly performance reports, FirstSupport.ai enhances productivity without sacrificing the personal touch that customers value.

Currently, the company has a small but dedicated team of four employees, guided by their commitment to innovation in customer experience. Their platform integrates seamlessly with Zendesk, making it accessible to businesses already utilizing this popular customer service tool.

One of their standout services is the automation of quality assurance (QA) and performance reviews for customer support interactions. This allows companies to generate scorecards for their agents, measure performance metrics, and ensure compliance—all while conducting real-time analyses of support tickets. 

FirstSupport.ai is tagged with key industry indicators, including 'artificial-intelligence,' 'saas,' 'b2b,' 'customer-support,' and 'ai-assistant,' reflecting its focus on combining technology with customer service.

For more information and to discover how to streamline your customer support processes, visit their website at [https://firstsupport.ai](https://firstsupport.ai) or reach out via email at hi@firstsupport.ai. 

In a world where customer expectations are rapidly evolving, FirstSupport.ai is stepping up to make customer service not just about managing inquiries, but about enhancing interactions—efficiently and effectively.
